titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of within the diocesse of Chester, in the ordinary visitation of the Reuerend Father in God, George, Lord Bishop of Chester, anno Domini 1605, and in the yeere of the raigne of our soueraigne Lord, Iames, by the grace of God, of Great Brittayne, France and Ireland, King, defender of the fayth, &c., viz. of Great Brittayne, Fraunce and Ireland, the third, and of Scotland the eight and thirtieth.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Chester. Bishop (1604-1615 : Lloyd)
Lloyd, George, 1560-1615.

titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of within the diocesse of Chester, in the ordinary visitation of the Reuerend Father in God, George, Lord Bishop of Chester, anno Domini 1605, and in the yeere of the raigne of our soueraigne Lord, Iames, by the grace of God, of Great Brittayne, France and Ireland, King, defender of the fayth, &c., viz. of Great Brittayne, Fraunce and Ireland, the third, and of Scotland the eight and thirtieth.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling in Hosier lane, neere Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with print show-through and creased with loss of print.
